com.djrapitops.plan.system.webserver.pages

Interface PageHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugPageHandler, InfoRequestPageHandler, PlayerPageHandler, PlayersPageHandler, PlayersTableJSONHandler, ResponseHandler, RootJSONHandler, RootPageHandler, ServerPageHandler, TreePageHandler

    public interface PageHandler
    PageHandlers are used for easier Response management and authorization checking.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response getResponse(Request request, RequestTarget target)
      Get the Response of a PageHandler.
      default boolean isAuthorized(Authentication auth, RequestTarget target) 

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        Response getResponse(Request request,
                     RequestTarget target)
              throws WebException
        Get the Response of a PageHandler.
        Parameters:
        request - Request in case it is useful for choosing page.
        target - Rest of the target coordinates after this page has been solved.
        Returns:
        Response appropriate to the PageHandler.
        Throws:
        WebException
